MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno, affecting properties in Clonmel Street, Somerset Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.33PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 9.33PM on 27th January 2021.
